Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioStreamInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioStreamInfo

  • public final class AudioStreamInfo
extends Object
    Provides audio stream information.

    This class provides initialized parameters of AudioCapturer and AudioRenderer, including the stream encoding format, sampling rate, audio channel, usage type, content type, session ID, buffer size, clearing flag, audio source, and stream flags.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO
